name: Beginners guide to graverobbing
description:
Is your bank account as empty as your soul?

Are you out of extra organs to donate?

Just follow these few easy steps and you, too, can transform your life from flat broke to rich and survivor of a mild stroke.

Made for Scream Lite game jam.

Fonts from dafont.com.

https://www.dafont.com/mortified.font

https://www.dafont.com/nixie-one.font

Dig sound:

https://freesound.org/people/andersmmg/sounds/516312/

Ambiance:

https://freesound.org/people/KRISTIANKULTA/sounds/326962/

Other SFX are from the standard assets package.
